nodes.text: Star Wars: I Am a Sith
Star Wars: I Am a Sith is a canon young-readers book. It was written by Christopher Nicholas and published by Golden Books on July 12, 2016.

Meet Darth Vader, Darth Maul, Darth Sidious, and all of the villainous Sith from the epic Star Wars space saga! Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this book is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages.
